name: flohmarkt
description: Flohmarkt is a self-hosted online flea market/classifieds platform. It supports listing items, messaging, moderation, and categories. Designed for local communities or group-based marketplaces with full data ownership.
features: Marketplace: Self-hosted classifieds platform, Item listings, Messaging and moderation. Local community marketplace.
Categories: Organize listings by type. Easy browsing.
Moderation: Control content and users. Safe community.
Data Ownership: Full control of marketplace data. Privacy-focused.
Messaging: Built-in chat for buyers and sellers. Direct communication.
Image Upload: Add photos to listings. Visual presentation.
Search: Find items quickly. Efficient discovery.
User Profiles: Track seller reputation. Trust building.
Notifications: Alert users of messages. Stay informed.
Mobile-Friendly: Works on all devices. Access anywhere.
